job description:
Your Responsibilities:
An ideal candidate will possess strong problem solving and conceptual thinking abilities in addition to communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills. This position will be in a fast-paced and entrepreneurial environment where you will be handling multiple concurrent projects while working independently and in teams.
  • You yearn to be part of cutting edge, high profile projects and are motivated by delivering world-class solutions on an aggressive schedule
  • You are not intimidated by challenges, thrive under pressure, are passionate about your craft, and are focused on delivering exceptional results
  • You love to learn new technologies and to help others to raise the bar on your team
  • Passionate about intuitive and engaging user interfaces, as well as new/emerging concepts and techniques
On Any Given Day You’ll
  • Build sustainable data driven solutions with new data technologies to meet the needs of our organization and business customers
  • Design robust end-to-end systems with an eye on the long term maintenance and support of the application (DevOps)
  • Look to leverage reusable code modules to solve problems across the team and organization
  • Exhibit mastery over multiple domains
  • Handle multiple functions / roles for the projects / Agile teams
  • Have an intrinsic knowledge of standards and languages
  • Look to leverage and establish standards across the team and organization
  • Understand complex multi-tier, multi-platform, distributed systems
  • Develop frameworks of significant complexity

    Why You?
Basic qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s Degree or military experience
  • Desire to develop distributed systems and build data pipelines
  • Exposure to big data technologies (Cassandra, Accumulo, HBase, Spark, Hadoop, HDFS, AVRO, MongoDB, Zookeeper, or similar)
  • Exposure to cloud technologies (Azure, AWS, Google Cloud)

    Preferred qualifications:
  • Experience with Agile engineering practices
  • 1+ years experience with NoSQL implementation (Mongo, Cassandra, etc. a plus)
  • 2+ years experience developing Java based software solutions
  • 2+ years experience in at least one scripting language (Python, Perl, JavaScript, Shell)
  • 2+ years experience developing software solutions to solve complex business problems
  • 2+ years experience with Relational Database Systems and SQL
  • 2+ years experience designing, developing, and implementing ETL
  • 2+ years experience with UNIX/Linux including basic commands and shell scripting
  • Familiarity with data science tools and concepts

    Why GSK?:
At GSK, our mission is to improve the quality of human life by enabling people to do more, feel better and live longer. Our three world-leading businesses research and deliver innovative medicines, vaccines and consumer healthcare products. We need a talented and motivated workforce to deliver against our strategy. To achieve this, we strive to attract the best people and to create an environment that empowers and inspires
